statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_records;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity, expected_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE expected_stock_quantity <> current_stock_quantity;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity, expected_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records ORDER BY expected_stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock_quantity < expected_stock_quantity;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE discrepancy_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, expected_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records ORDER BY expected_stock_quantity ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity, expected_stock_quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock_quantity = 0 OR expected_stock_quantity = 0;
SELECT product_name, discrepancy_reason FROM inventory_records WHERE LENGTH(discrepancy_reason) > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT quantity, location FROM InventoryRecords WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT record_id, product_id, quantity FROM InventoryRecords WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT discrepancy_id, description FROM Discrepancies WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT record_id, location FROM InventoryRecords ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT record_id, product_id FROM InventoryRecords WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords WHERE quantity < 5 AND location IN ('Warehouse B', 'Warehouse C') ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT record_id, description FROM InventoryRecords JOIN Discrepancies ON InventoryRecords.record_id = Discrepancies.record_id WHERE Discrepancies.resolved = FALSE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM InventoryRecords WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory_records WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_records WHERE initial_stock > current_stock;
SELECT product_name, initial_stock, current_stock FROM inventory_records ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM discrepancy_logs WHERE discrepancy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, discrepancy_details FROM discrepancy_logs JOIN resolved_discrepancies ON discrepancy_logs.log_id = resolved_discrepancies.log_id WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_records WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory_records ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_records WHERE initial_stock > current_stock;
SELECT r.resolution_date, d.product_id, d.discrepancy_details FROM resolved_discrepancies r JOIN discrepancy_logs d ON r.log_id = d.log_id;
SELECT product_name, initial_stock, current_stock FROM inventory_records WHERE current_stock < initial_stock ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_records ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM discrepancies WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT resolved_by, resolution_date FROM resolved_discrepancies WHERE resolution_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_records WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_records;
SELECT record_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_records WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT record_id, product_name, last_updated FROM inventory_records ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM resolved_discrepancies WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT stock.product_id, stock.current_stock, control.minimum_stock FROM stock_control AS control JOIN inventory_records AS stock ON control.product_id = stock.record_id;
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM InventoryRecords WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT record_id, location, last_updated FROM InventoryRecords ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT discrepancy_id, record_id, resolution_status FROM Discrepancies WHERE resolution_status = 'Unresolved';
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY record_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT record_id, location, quantity FROM InventoryRecords WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM InventoryRecords ir JOIN ProductDetails pd ON ir.product_id = pd.product_id WHERE pd.supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT record_id, discrepancy_description, resolution_status FROM Discrepancies WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY discrepancy_id ASC;
